class.name: AbilitySystemComponent
class.brief_description: The central component of the Gameplay Ability System.
class.description: The [AbilitySystemComponent] (ASC) acts as the central hub for the GAS. It manages: - [GameplayAbility]s (granting, activating). - [GameplayEffect]s (applying, managing duration). - [AttributeSet]s (storing and modifying attributes). - [GameplayTag]s (tracking active states). It also integrates with sibling components like AudioStreamPlayer and AnimationPlayer.

method.name: add_attribute_set
method.description: Adds an attribute set to the component.

method.name: add_tag
method.description: Adds a gameplay tag to the component.

method.name: apply_gameplay_effect_to_self
method.description: Applies an effect to the component itself.

method.name: execute_gameplay_cue
method.description: Executes a GameplayCue at the specified location.

method.name: get_attribute_value
method.description: Returns the current value of an attribute by name.

method.name: give_ability
method.description: Grants an ability to the component.

method.name: has_tag
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the component has the specified tag (hierarchical).

method.name: remove_tag
method.description: Removes a gameplay tag from the component.

method.name: try_activate_ability
method.description: Tries to activate the specified ability.

Path to a sibling AudioStreamPlayer node (2D or 3D).

signal.name: ability_activated
signal.description: Emitted when an ability is successfully activated.

signal.name: effect_applied
signal.description: Emitted when a gameplay effect is applied.

signal.name: tag_added
signal.description: Emitted when a gameplay tag is added.

signal.name: tag_removed
signal.description: Emitted when a gameplay tag is removed.
